deployedGeneratedSources.name: #utility.yul

documentation.text:
@title Governance contract
 @dev All contracts that will be owned by a Governor entity should extend this contract.
@dev Check if the caller is the governor.
@dev Initialize the governor to the contract caller.

@dev Admin function for pending governor to accept role and update governor.
 This function must called by the pending governor.

@title Governance contract
 @dev All contracts that will be owned by a Governor entity should extend this contract.
@dev Check if the caller is the governor.
@dev Initialize the governor to the contract caller.

@dev Admin function for pending governor to accept role and update governor.
 This function must called by the pending governor.

devdoc.details: All contracts that will be owned by a Governor entity should extend this contract.

acceptOwnership().details: Admin function for pending governor to accept role and update governor. This function must called by the pending governor.

transferOwnership(address).details: Admin function to begin change of governor. The `_newGovernor` must call `acceptOwnership` to finalize the transfer.

devdoc.title: Governance contract
